Job details

Urgently Hiring Remote Sr Sales Manager for Global Semiconductor Market Leader

This Jobot Job is hosted by Alvin Truong

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the “Easy Apply” button and sending us your resume.

Salary $75,000 – $350,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are a rapidly growing publicly-traded global semiconductor company that is looking for a Sr Sales Manager responsible for managing identified key accounts in the Eastern US and Canada territory and execute strategic business plans. You will use your technical knowledge of circuits and be able to discuss design issues and present the technical benefits of our products to solve customer challenges.

If you are a Sr Sales Manager with a strong background in strategic sales with enterprise accounts, business development, and driving partnerships, Please apply today!

Why join us?
• Strong Compensation Package + RSU’s
• Extensive PTO
• Huge Room for Growth
• Weekly Lunches & Fun Company Culture!
• Great 401k Match
• Health, Vision, Dental Benefits

Job Details

Responsibilities
• Aggressively drive new business by identifying opportunities and utilizing value-based selling.
• Manage and grow business with customers in the Eastern region of U.S & Canada.
• Co-work with Sales team members to manage business in other global regions (e.g. EMEA and Greater China), both transfer business w contract manufacturers, and well as design activity in multiple locations
• Develop business cases for new products and participate in product and company strategy development
• Present to purchasing staff, engineers, and management at accounts of interest in a professional setting as the front line representative of the company.
• Manage identified key accounts in the territory and drive sales objectives.
• Coordinate with Reps in the territory for success at named accounts using channel partners as needed.
• Provide customer support as needed responding to customer technical and commercial questions.
• Provide market feedback to the company on the competitive environment and new product ideas and features.
• Maintain the CRM database with accurate customer and channel information regarding sales opportunities, design ins, design wins and production status.
• Prepare accurate forecasts of business for use in capacity planning, longer range resource planning and sales prioritization.
• Include company resources, engineers and management, in account calls as required.
• Provide new product training and drive Disti sales, and lead them to generate increased Sales
• Drive other projects as needed by management or as business needs change

Qualifications
• Minimum of 7+ years of semiconductor sales experience
• Bachelor’s degree or higher in (Electrical engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, or equivalent)
• Good skill of customer relationship management, complex organization penetration
• Deeply penetrate major accounts in assigned region.
• Experience working with or strong understanding of circuits
• Experience managing Distributor network
• Understanding of semiconductor engineering terms that are relevant to the company’s product
• Strong verbal and written communication skills
• Demonstrate a Positive, Collaborative, and Enthusiastic attitude

Bonus
• MBA Degree
• Sales Management experience
• FAE experience
• Inquisitive and a deep desire to learn new technologies
• Self-starter that can work independently without proximity supervision

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the “Easy Apply” button.
